title: Am I the only one not celebrating the fact that Riven and Zed are disabled?
body:
Zed has been overnerfed to the point of obscurity, and Riven isn't hard to deal with at all, especially in teamfights.  I've seen one Zed since his ult got nerfed, and he was playing support.

I don't play either of them, and I don't mind playing against them in the slightest.  Why are people still acting as if they're cancerous auto-wins?
